original_text: I know you are enduring patiently and bearing up for my name's sake, and you have not grown weary.
korean_text: 또 네가 참고 내 이름을 위하여 견디고 게으르지 아니한 것을 아노라

sentences.original_text: I know you are enduring patiently
and bearing up for my name's sake,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내 이름을 위해 견디고 있으며,

sentences.original_text: and you have not grown weary.
